HOME_PAGE_MESSAGE_1: Welcome! You are connected to the interactive facade of building A1 of Bordeaux University.
HOME_PAGE_MESSAGE_2: . 71 colorful pixels enlight all the building's windows.
HOME_PAGE_MESSAGE_3: By using this app, you will be able to change colors of the facade, enjoy retrogaming such as Tetris Snake and more, or even learn computer program during special workshops with a trainer
HOME_PAGE_HREF_MESSAGE: check the date of the next workshop
FLAGS_DESCRIPTION: Light Arbalet Frontage to the colors of your country!
SWEEPASYNC_DESCRIPTION: Display the full color whell, each window at a different pace.
SWEEPRAND_DESCRIPTION: Dispaly the full color wheel, with a spread color range.
SNAKE_DESCRIPTION: Play a Snake and eat apples. You can cross walls, but don't smash your tail!
SNAP_DESCRIPTION: Learning computer programming with a playful and creative approach by creating your own light animation thanks to this visual programming language
LOGIN_PAGE_FRONTAGE_DOWN_ALERT: The facade is not active. It will be available at:
LOGIN_PAGE_SERVER_DOWN_ALERT: Server is not reachable. Are you nearby the frontage?
FLAGS_OPTIONS_PAGE_QUEUE_ALERT: Wait a little, you are queued in position:
OPTIONS_PAGE_NO_OPTIONS: No options needed for this FApp.
ERROR_PAGE_MESSAGE: An unknown error appeared ! You may try to reconnect by clicking on the button below.
